English.Text: The navigator is as sure of himself as he can be in the circumstances. "If I were Pyrphorian, god help me, I would head for Montoya," his finger circles the large settlement, "it has a large marina where my devilish vessel might be easily concealed." Upon searching Montoya harbour, they indeed find the Pyrphorian ship in a secluded corner of mangrove. That being well, they must hope now they have not lost too much time.
